member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IgnoresAccessChecksToAttribute
member.summary: Attribute which tells the runtime not to worry about accessibility modifiers and visibility of type members in the target assembly.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IgnoresAccessChecksToAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the IgnoreAccessChecksToAttribute with the specified target assembly name

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IgnoresAccessChecksToAttribute.AssemblyName
member.summary: The name of the target assembly for which access checks are not performed at runtime.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CollectionMarshal
member.summary: An unsafe class that provides a set of methods to access the underlying data representations of collections.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CollectionMarshal.AsSpan``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: Gets a Span<> view over the data in .
member.remarks: Warning: Read-only operation! Items should not be added or removed from the List<> while the Span<> is in use.
member.param: List from which to create the Span<>.
member.returns: A Span<> instance over the List<>.

member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.__ListXTension
